bug.author: Marco1097
bug.summary: Navigation: Counts not readable on small screens or when count is too large
bug.description:
When the height of the windows is less than the height of the left menu, some numbers are cut and are not readable at 100% Firefox Browser 83.0 (64 bit) Tested on the demo website and on the latest docker release <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23193188/101290022-2f522480-3800-11eb-9271-52b9c5af0935.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23193188/101290067-66283a80-3800-11eb-8947-913ce8f74a94.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting this! Noticed this already, but guess it's good enough for a first release anyway. Also issues when you happen to have millions of photos as space runs out. Need to shorten the counts.
